entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening then becoming north 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
